overview:
Prashant Bhavaraju is responsible for driving marketing, brand positioning, sales support and sales enablement initiatives at Trianz. He has over a decade of experience and success in driving operational growth, managing people & projects and maximizing business opportunities. Prior to Trianz, Prashant was associated with BlueAlly / Megasoft and VisualSoft Technologies where he worked on technology, and business roles managing outsourcing engagements with multiple Fortune 500 companies and SMBs.

Prashant has a Bachelor of Engineering degree in Computer Sciences from Shivaji University, India, a Master of Science degree in Information Systems from DePaul University, Chicago, along with Project Management Certification from Penn State University and Lean Six Sigma Certification from Purdue University. He is presently pursuing a Post-graduate Program in Management for Senior Executives at the Indian School of Business, Hyderabad.
